title: Love the challenge, not the reward
description: I've always been chasing the next goal, but I've recently found that it's a flawed way of living. Instead, you need to find value in the challenges that might get you there.

title: My happiness filter
description: A few specific habits are vital to my mental health. I've identified them and practice them everyday. Together, they make up my 'Happiness Filter'.

title: Strategy is problem-solving
description: There are many opinions about what strategy is and how to do it well. However, most people get it wrong. A good strategy is not goal-setting â€” it is problem-solving.

title: Fighting the Dunning-Kruger effect
description: Writing notes. My way of expanding my knowledge and capture what I learn.
